model.name: faultToleranceConfiguration
model.title: Fault Tolerance Configuration
model.description: MicroProfile Fault Tolerance Circuit Breaker EIP configuration
model.label: configuration,eip

circuitBreaker.label: advanced
circuitBreaker.description: Refers to an existing io.smallrye.faulttolerance.core.circuit.breaker.CircuitBreaker instance to lookup and use from the registry. When using this, then any other circuit breaker options are not in use.

delay.description: Control how long the circuit breaker stays open. The default is 5 seconds.

successThreshold.description: Controls the number of trial calls which are allowed when the circuit breaker is half-open

requestVolumeThreshold.description: Controls the size of the rolling window used when the circuit breaker is closed

failureRatio.description: Configures the failure rate threshold in percentage. If the failure rate is equal or greater than the threshold the CircuitBreaker transitions to open and starts short-circuiting calls. The threshold must be greater than 0 and not greater than 100. Default value is 50 percentage.

timeoutEnabled.description: Whether timeout is enabled or not on the circuit breaker. Default is false.

timeoutDuration.description: Configures the thread execution timeout. Default value is 1 second.

timeoutPoolSize.label: advanced
timeoutPoolSize.description: Configures the pool size of the thread pool when timeout is enabled. Default value is 10.

timeoutScheduledExecutorService.label: advanced
timeoutScheduledExecutorService.description: References to a custom thread pool to use when timeout is enabled

bulkheadEnabled.description: Whether bulkhead is enabled or not on the circuit breaker. Default is false.

bulkheadMaxConcurrentCalls.label: advanced
bulkheadMaxConcurrentCalls.description: Configures the max amount of concurrent calls the bulkhead will support.

bulkheadWaitingTaskQueue.label: advanced
bulkheadWaitingTaskQueue.description: Configures the task queue size for holding waiting tasks to be processed by the bulkhead.

bulkheadExecutorService.label: advanced
bulkheadExecutorService.description: References to a custom thread pool to use when bulkhead is enabled.
